formId.description: Unique identifier for the form being submitted.

submittedFields.description: Key-value pairs of submitted form fields.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the form was submitted.

formDescription.description: A brief description of the form's purpose, which helps analyze the entry.

entryValidity.description: Indicates if the entry is valid based on form rules.

purposeAnalysis.description: Analysis result determining the purpose of the form based on the entry.

feedback.description: Feedback on the entry for further action or user guidance.

sendEmailNotification.description: Indicates if an email notification should be sent upon submission.

redirectUrl.description: URL to redirect the user after form submission, if applicable.

displayMessage.description: Message to display to the user after form submission.
